title: Matchsafe, "Table top candle Holder", 1906–07
markings: Unidentified maker's mark (partially legible C & Co.), partially legible lion passant, leopard's head, date letter "l" all stamped on underside.
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: In the form of a small, square, table-top candle or sealing wax holder, small looped handle on side, flat match container lid on opposite side of handle, candle holder on top. Striker on 3rd side, adjacent to thumb catch at front of lid.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Table top candle Holder", 1906–07.
1906–07. Silver. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1980-14-958.
